resources.string: Go to edit message replay text screen.
Go to Contact to select to whom you preferred to receive alert message.
Go to Message to set custom message.
Go to Visual Message to visualize your custom message in real time.
Popup menu to clear text list.
I am in trouble, please help by reaching to below location.
I am in trouble, this is an emergency please help me.
I am in need, do reach me ASAP!
Emergency! something happened to me please reach me.
